docs.snippet: Pan-American Day will be celebrated on Tuesday as a joint observance of historic anniversaries and mutual friendship of the nations of the Americas. On this day the peoples of the Americas reaffirm their faith in the enduring bonds of American...
docs.lead_paragraph: Pan-American Day will be celebrated on Tuesday as a joint observance of historic anniversaries and mutual friendship of the nations of the Americas. On this day the peoples of the Americas reaffirm their faith in the enduring bonds of American solidarity.

headline.main: NATIONS TO MARK PAN-AMERICAN DAY; Celebrations Will Be Held Next Tuesday Throughout the New World. CHIEF FETE IN WASHINGTON Hull Will Be Principal Speaker -- Concert to Be Given by United Service Orchestra.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 12. -- Cordial acceptance of President Roosevelt's proposal for an inter-American conference at Buenos Aires to consolidate peace in the Western Hemisphere and suggestions for a wide variety of subjects for the agenda are contained...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 12. -- Cordial acceptance of President Roosevelt's proposal for an inter-American conference at Buenos Aires to consolidate peace in the Western Hemisphere and suggestions for a wide variety of subjects for the agenda are contained in replies from heads of Latin American States, which were made public tonight by the State Department.
docs.abstract: Treaties now in existence; anti-war treaty of 1933 cited

headline.main: LEAGUE OF NATIONS IN AMERICAS URGED BY 3 LATIN STATES; This Is One of Suggestions in the 17 Favorable Replies to Roosevelt's Parley Project.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, April 16. -- Argentine suggestions for discussion at the projected Pan-American Peace Conference, contained in the form of a draft treaty sent to President Roosevelt by Foreign Minister Carlos Saavedra Lamas, on the whole were well...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, April 16. -- Argentine suggestions for discussion at the projected Pan-American Peace Conference, contained in the form of a draft treaty sent to President Roosevelt by Foreign Minister Carlos Saavedra Lamas, on the whole were well received here.
docs.abstract: plans turned over to agenda com; Sec Hull comments

headline.main: ARGENTINE PLANS APPROVED BY U.S.; Many Proposals Included in the Draft Treaty Already Accepted, Hull Says. INTERVENTION IS OPPOSED Administration to Submit Its Own Scheme for Consideration at Peace Conference.

docs.snippet: Credit, collection and exchange conditions in Latin-American markets showed marked improvement in the first three months of this year, compared with the closing quarter of 1935, the quarterly survey compiled yesterday by the foreign department of the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Credit, collection and exchange conditions in Latin-American markets showed marked improvement in the first three months of this year, compared with the closing quarter of 1935, the quarterly survey compiled yesterday by the foreign department of the National Association of Credit Men discloses.

headline.main: LATIN AMERICA SHOWS UPTURN FOR QUARTER; Credit Group Reports Collections and Exchange Recorded Marked Advance.
